rows.label: qst004001_msg0001
rows.name:
So you're the helper Yan
sent. Nice to meet you!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0002
rows.name:
I need you to track down the
culprit who cut the wire!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0003
rows.name:
To solve a crime, you first
ask around! Gather information
from the townsfolk!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0004
rows.name:
Men and women, young and
old... er... women and old,
young and men... huh?

rows.label: qst004001_msg0005
rows.name:
Um... Everyone loves
gossip, so go ask around!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0101
rows.name:
How's the information gathering
going? Capturing the culprit
is your responsibility!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0102
rows.name:
A Superbian soldier used
that word before... What
does "responsibility" mean?

rows.label: qst004001_msg0103
rows.name:
I bet they think using difficult
words makes them sound smart!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0203
rows.name:
It was Tirkin shooting
it with bows! Awesome!!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0204
rows.name:
That wire Mache-ossan made was
super strong, but they cut it
with bows! That's amazing!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0205
rows.name:
You guys are amazing! I'll
go report to Chief Yan that
the case is solved!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0206
rows.name:
Now then, for capturing the
culprits, I shall bestow upon
you an amazing reward!
